tool_description: Get live scores for all the cricket matches
name: Live Cricket Scores
title: Live Cricket Scores

api_list.name: Get Featured matches
api_list.description: Get the list of all featured matches, and the list of active tournaments.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-cricket-scores3.p.rapidapi.com/get-cricket-matches/featured_v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-cricket-scores3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-cricket-scores3.p.rapidapi.com/get-cricket-matches/featured_v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-cricket-scores3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
